g.aria-label: X-axis titled 'maximum temperature (°F)' for a discrete scale with 15 values: <30, 31-35, 36-40, 41-45, 46-50, ending with >100
Y-axis titled 'minutes' for a linear scale with values from −120 to 80
Subtitle text 'Low-risk industries. Source: Zivin and Neidell (2021)'
g.text: Low-risk industries. Source: Zivin and Neidell (2021)
